channel.title: Suggestion would be appreciated
channel.description:
Hi everyone, just a simple question:
Can anyone point me in the direction of a "as close as possible" private server to the current runescape? I'm not really into classic and I understand development is having a difficult time with certain features that runescape has right now. I am just looking for a server that doesn't log you in with tons of gold or equipment. I actually just want to progress in the game on my free time on my computer(offline) and can't seem to find out which one is the best pick.
Well any answer is appreciated, thanks!

item.title: Suggestion would be appreciated

item.title: Suggestion would be appreciated

item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

Just download a clean delta , remove all the shit you don’t like in it. How hard can that be?

Thanks.
